column4: I tried to connect to it again, and got kicked out of the room, then my connection wouldnt connect at all.
So, I tried rebooting, and now I don't have wifi as an option anymore, and it's not listed in ifconfig :(
is ndiswrapper loaded?
Didnt use it.
I just compiled the driver that I got working before, and use ./wlan0up to turn it on.
you probably need t load the driver manually
How do I do that?
do you know what kernel module it uses?
No, but gimme a sec, and I'll see what I can do
ok, do you still have the folder with the driver sources etc?
Oh yea, Im trying ./makedrv again to see if i can get it to recognize it again
woot!
Ok, I got it to see my card
in that same directory, run ls | grep *.ko    .ko files are module files
